description: Try our easy to follow Warm Pumpkin & Beet Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Warm Pumpkin & Beet Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500 g plump and juicy whole beetroot

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, whisk mustard, honey, vinegar and remaining oil in a small bowl. Season. Place couscous mixture on serving plate. Top with vegetables and onion. Spoon over dressing and serve scattered with feta and macadamias.
